path: artifacts/Dogemom Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_path.CoinToken: contracts/Dogemom Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/CoinToken

findings.title: Floating Pragma
findings.description: Contracts should be deployed with the same compiler version and flags that they have been tested with thoroughly.

findings.title: Missing zero address validation
findings.description: When sending tokens/ether to an address, it should be checked for zero address. Otherwise, tokens/ether sent to the zero address may be burnt forever.
